diff_hunk:
@@ -2069,10 +2242,10 @@ bool CUDABlas::DoBlasGemmWithAlgorithmImpl(
   static_assert(blas::kDefaultGemmAlgo == CUBLAS_GEMM_DFALT, "");
   bool result = DoBlasInternalFailureOK(
       wrap::cublasGemmEx, stream, /* pointer_mode_host = */ true,
-      CUDABlasTranspose(transa), CUDABlasTranspose(transb), m, n, k, &alpha,
-      CUDAMemory(a), cuda_in_type, lda, CUDAMemory(b), cuda_in_type, ldb, &beta,

body: Added cuda 9.0 algos, including tensor ops, to the algorithm list. Also, added checks to DoBlasGemmWithAlgorithmImpl to return false if tensor_op algorithm is requested when not appropriate. These changes enable the auto-tuning path to use tensor-ops.
body_html: Added cuda 9.0 algos, including tensor ops, to the algorithm list. Also, added checks to DoBlasGemmWithAlgorithmImpl to return false if tensor_op algorithm is requested when not appropriate. These changes enable the auto-tuning path to use tensor-ops.
body_text: Added cuda 9.0 algos, including tensor ops, to the algorithm list. Also, added checks to DoBlasGemmWithAlgorithmImpl to return false if tensor_op algorithm is requested when not appropriate. These changes enable the auto-tuning path to use tensor-ops.
